description: Mikihiro is Mayu`s older brother. He is an incubus, the male counterpart of a succubus. He is very sneaky and devious, although not evil, and good at manipulating others to do what he wants, like Reika for instance. He seems to have known Ryouko for a long time, as they are often seen working together, even in flashbacks.
name: Tsukimura Mikihiro
